titleStmt.title: A manifest and breife discovery of some of the errours contained in a dialogue called the Marrow of moderne divinity. Wherein is shewen, especially the authors errour in the manner of the iustification of a sinner, and the truth cleared from all the falshoods contained in that booke concerning the same, with some other of his errours.
titleStmt.author: I. A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Joshua Kirton, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the White Horse in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Fisher, Edward. Marrow of modern divinity.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
